title: Mystery gifting problem?
body: So, since self mystery gifting has been open (12:01 this morning) I have been unable to mystery gift myself, as it comes up with an error message. Anybody else having this problem?

replies.body:
Hi Viretine,

Thanks for the report - we are working on fixing this.

-Mindstar

This should be working again now.  Let me know if there are any further issues.

-Mindstar
Thanks for that! If only it hadn't gifted me anothwr vayne skin.

Does work again... At least for now. TY

-I'm bad at lee and I know it

Yep it works now 

TY Riot
riot said that they are taking down gifting for probs a couple of hours to fix a bug
guys chill out. the mystery gift to yourself opens up on the 29th ( tomorrow)

> guys chill out. the mystery gift to yourself opens up on the 29th ( tomorrow)

Nope

> Self Mystery Gifting
> From 00:01 AEDT November 28 through 23:59 AEDT December 1

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/skins-still-vault-hours-being-stolen
and I'm now getting an error saying "Item does not exist (word) was recently removed"
Yeah this is happening to me too. No idea why though.
